definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: What words can you find and use creatively?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到并创造性地使用哪些词呢？

sentences.english: You need to think creatively— outside the box .
sentences.chinese: 你应该跳出惯有思维方式，去创造性地思考。

sentences.english: Genet teaches you to think creatively.
sentences.chinese: 吉尼特教你创造性地思考问题。

sentences.english: Remember that this baseline information might have to be refreshed periodically.
sentences.chinese: 请记住，可能需要周期性地更新这个基准信息。

sentences.english: You solve problems creatively and are eager to take action.
sentences.chinese: 你就能创造性地解决问题，积极地行动。

sentences.english: Are they endlessly inventive with language in the way we are?
sentences.chinese: 他们可以像我们一样创造性地使用语言吗？

sentences.english: It's a vital part of staying healthy and being able to work creatively.
sentences.chinese: 没有休息，就谈不上身体健康，谈不上创造性地工作。

sentences.english: We use this creatively, in ways that expand our knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 我们以扩展知识的方式创造性地利用了这一点。

sentences.english: Looking for a creative way to wind up and manage your headphone cables?
sentences.chinese: 寻找一个创造性地清盘和管理您的耳机线？

sentences.english: Creatively expressing yourself is like making love to the universe.
sentences.chinese: 创造性地表现自我就如同向全世界表达爱意。

sentences.english: He inventively incorporates traditional Chinese ink in its solid form into his works.
sentences.chinese: 他创造性地将传统的条墨用于作品创作。

sentences.english: Am I empowered to be creative and do things my way?
sentences.chinese: 我能否富有创造性地按照自己的思路来做事？

sentences.english: Some of the nicest homes in Florida are periodically crushed by hurricanes.
sentences.chinese: 飓风正在周期性地摧毁佛罗里达一些最美丽的住宅。
景气状况周期性地出现。

sentences.english: Take 5 to 10 deep breaths periodically throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 一天内周期性地进行5到10次深呼吸。

definition: so as to/for the purpose of/in order to
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
